text: Konica mount may refer to: *Konica F-mount, 35mm SLR lens mount between 1960 and 1965 *Konica AR-mount, 35mm SLR lens mount between 1965 and 1988 *Konica KM-mount, 35mm Leica M-compatible rangefinder lens mount between 1999 and 2002 *Konica L-mount, 35mm Leica L-compatible screw lens mount (M39×26tpi) ==See also== *Konica Minolta A-mount
title: Konica mount
